entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 9:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure: 103.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -27.4°C
Wind: ESE 35 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:35 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:35 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
